_README: BU DOSYA HEM CANLI SISTEM TARAFINDAN OKUNUR HEM DE AI AJANI ICIN MIMARI HARITADIR. YAPISINI BOZMAYIN.

project_meta.name: Duxa Platform
project_meta.description: Offline-first SaaS + Hardware ecosystem. Hybrid architecture (Cloud + Local).

core_philosophy.offline_first: Kiosks/POS must run 100% offline via Local SQLite, syncing to Supabase when online.
core_philosophy.hardware_bond: We act as both hardware vendor and software provider.
core_philosophy.zero_build_errors: Strict TypeScript, no 'any' types, verified imports.

customer_admin.desc: Restaurant Owner Dashboard (Menu Builder, Stats, Staff Mgmt).

operational_apps.web_menu: QR Code ordering for customers (Mobile Web).
